Not seeing any hits in the gate in the last 7 days:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

Maybe this is fixed now?  I'm not seeing anything good to fingerprint against either, so thinking we should close this until it shows up again, if it does.
